name: organic ankle leggings
description:
Our leggings are made from a slightly heavier weight organic cotton, which has been blended with spandex, giving the leggings more support where you need it.

Cut higher in the back and lower in the front, helping the legging form fit to your shape. The thin waist band sits on your hip, without digging in, as it has been sewn into the legging.

This legging is cut at the ankle.

The s/m its sizes 8 to 12 and the m/l 14 to 18. The m/l is also a great pregnancy legging.

name: Miriam Tunic
description:
Made from soft organic cotton and dyed natural with plants.

A Line dress / tunic that starts from just under the arm to give a beautiful sweep.
Pin tuck details in the front show a small amount of red detail. There is a wide hem feature.
This tunic is great on its own or with leggings or jeans.
Sizing
s/m : 8-12
m/l : 14- 16 +

name: Loli Dress
description:
This A-Line tunic dress is made from soft organic cotton and is dyed with plants.
A classic dress has a peter pan collar, pin tucks in the front, with a slight red detail (in both the white and slate).

The wide hem creates a drape to the dress.

Size range is
small : 6 mths to 2 years
medium : 2 to 4 yrs
large : 4 to 6 yrs

name: girls halter dress
description:
Limited edition, luxurious linen feel organic cotton, dyed naturally with plants, with an extra wide hem feature.

This dress is multi sized starting off as a dress (within size range stated), then can be used as a top for many sizes after.

Colours are natural (cream) and a beautifully detailed slate. As the slate is a natural plant dye, it will develop into its own unique shade over time, but will not fade instantly or to grey.

It has a wonderful sweep and bell shaped back, with soft wide ties at the neck.
small : 6mth to 1 yr
medium : 2 yrs 
large : 3yrs

All eco peko purchases will be beautifully gift wrapped with recycled tissue and paper, that have been hand stamped.

name: long sleeved top
description:
This top is made from soft organic cotton is dyed naturally with plants,  and has an extra wide hem feature.

This smart looking grandfather style top, has coconut buttons, an enforced yoke and extra length for more sizes. It looks good with a full length sleeve and, as your child gets older, a classic 3/4 length sleeve.

Colours are natural (cream) and a beautiful complex slate. As the slate is a natural plant dye, it will develop into its own unique shade over time, but will not fade instantly or to grey.

sizes are :
small : 6mth to 2 yrs
medium : 2 yrs to 4 yrs
large : 4 yrs to 6 yrs

name: baby bamboodie
description:
bamboo + hoodie =
bamboodie
eco sun wear, play wear & sleep wear for your baby


high uv protection . hypoallergenic . antibacterial . 
light & silky soft . superior breathability . dries super quick





Bamboodie’s give sun protection for the beach & the park, coverage in Autumn and Spring and a great piece to layer in winter. Bamboodie’s are versatile, protective, eco and have a very practical, simple design. 
 
what is a bamboodie?....Bamboodie is a long sleeved, hooded top that has an extra long body for ultimate coverage. Its made from bamboo is light and silky soft.

Bamboodie’s are naturally anti-bacterial & hypoallergenic, U.V reflective and have superior breathability. This makes the top, cool in summer and warm in winter. So not only will it be great for baby at the beach (dries super quick!), but in winter, can be the first layer on to keep a constant temperature.
Bamboo is nature’s most sustainable resource & is naturally regenerative.
bamboodies are an amazing baby bamboo hoodie for all seasons

The natural bamboodie has a starfish, the turquoise a nautilus shell and the burnt orange a coral trout.

All eco peko purchases will be beautifully gift wrapped with recycled tissue and paper, that have been hand stamped.

name: adult bamboodie
description:
bamboo + hoodie = 
bamboodie 
eco sun wear, play wear & sleep wear for you

high uv protection . hypoallergenic . antibacterial . light & silky soft . superior breathability . dries super quick

Bamboodie’s give sun protection for the beach & the park, coverage in Autumn and Spring and a great piece to layer in winter. They look great on their own, or teamed with leggings and boots for winter.
Bamboodie’s are versatile, protective, eco and have a very practical, simple design. 

what is a bamboodie?....Bamboodie is a long sleeved, hooded top / tunic that has an extra long body for ultimate coverage. It can be worn on its own or with leggings. Its made from bamboo is light and silky soft.

Bamboodie’s are naturally anti-bacterial & hypoallergenic, U.V reflective and have superior breathability. This makes the top, cool in summer and warm in winter.  
Bamboo is nature’s most sustainable resource & is naturally regenerative. 
bamboodies are an amazing bamboo hoodie tunic for all seasons

The natural colour has a starfish design, the turquoise a nautilus shell and the burnt orange a coral trout.

Bamboodies have a very loose fit .
Sizing : small (8-10), medium (10-12), large (14 +)

name: Camomile T-shirt
description: Beautifully soft organic t-shirt, with a digital print of a field of camomile stitched on…A perfect t-shirt to calm your baby.

name: Artichoke T-shirt
description:
This wonderful artichoke was photographed on an organic farm near our house in the Hills of Perth.
Digitally printed image sewn onto one of our beautifully soft organic t-shirts

name: duck with attitude
description:
This is a picture of Donny, a very outspoken duck from our local organic farm.

The lovely Carolyn ran an organic farm school, that the kids loved, called A Garden Path http://bedfordale.com/gardenpath.htm

eco peko t-shirts are made from a high thread count organic cotton, so are super soft & don't loose their shape. Our t-shirts are cut a little longer to get the most wear possible.

The picture has been digitally printed on calico and then sewn on. It is part of a limited edition and goes well with the organic jeans.

All eco peko purchases will be beautifully gift wrapped with recycled tissue and paper, that have been hand stamped.

ecopeko kids love chemical free food (they really like growing their own as well....its really fun). It helps them grow big and strong, be good and not pesty at all (most of the time ;)

eco peko t-shirts are made from a high thread count organic cotton, so are super soft & don't loose their shape. Our t-shirts are cut a little longer to get the most wear possible.

all t-shirts are available in long or short sleeves

Available Sizes: Current availability shown in the drop down menu.
0-3m, 3-6m, 6-12m (has an envelope neck) and 1 yr and 2 yr (a round neck) 
All of our sizing is very generous, with the size 2 fitting most 4 yr olds.
